name: Provident Bancorp, Inc.
description: Provident Bancorp, Inc. is a community-focused bank that serves the financial needs of individuals and businesses primarily in the New England region. Established in 1828, the company has a rich history of providing personalized banking services and fostering long-term relationships with its customers. Provident Bancorp operates through its wholly-owned subsidiary, The Provident Bank, which offers a comprehensive range of financial products including checking and savings accounts, mortgages, home equity loans, and commercial lending solutions. The bank is dedicated to enhancing the financial well-being of its customers while promoting community development and investment. With a commitment to local businesses, Provident Bancorp actively participates in community outreach programs and supports various local initiatives. The company prides itself on its customer service, leveraging technology to provide convenient banking solutions without sacrificing the personal touch. As a public company, Provident Bancorp is committed to transparency and accountability, ensuring that its stakeholders are well-informed about its operations and financial performance. The bank's mission is to provide exceptional financial services while contributing to the economic health of the communities it serves.

seo.meta_title: Provident Bancorp, Inc. | Community-Focused Banking Solutions
seo.meta_description: Discover Provident Bancorp, Inc., your trusted partner in community banking. Explore our range of personal and business banking services tailored to meet your financial needs.

faq.question: What services does Provident Bancorp offer?
faq.answer: Provident Bancorp offers a range of services including personal and business banking products, mortgages, and commercial loans.

faq.question: Where is Provident Bancorp headquartered?
faq.answer: Provident Bancorp is headquartered in Amesbury, Massachusetts, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Provident Bancorp?
faq.answer: Chris M. A. O’Connor is the CEO of Provident Bancorp, Inc.
